Environment: Ensure you are in a quiet and distraction-free environment for the duration of the exam.
Inform household members or roommates of your exam schedule to minimize disturbances.
Communication: Do not communicate with anyone during the assessment, including through messaging, social media platforms, or any other means.
Any attempt to seek help or share answers will result in immediate disqualification.
Materials: Use only authorized materials and resources. Any attempt to use unauthorized materials, such as textbooks, notes, or online resources, will be considered cheating.
Keep your workspace clear of any items not permitted for the exam.
Technical Issues: Ensure your device is fully charged or connected to a power source.
Have a stable internet connection to prevent disruptions.
If you encounter technical issues, contact the support team immediately using the provided contact information.

Exam Instructions.Question Reading: Read all questions carefully before answering to understand what is being asked.
Timing: The duration of this exam is 120 minutes. Manage your time wisely to complete all sections within the allocated time frame.
A notification will alert you when there are 5 minutes remaining.
Exam Instructions.Saving Progress: Save your progress periodically to prevent loss of work due to technical issues.
Browser and Timer: Once started, the timer will continue to run even if you close the browser window.
Ensure you do not close the browser or navigate away from the exam page unnecessarily.
Submission: The exam will automatically submit when the allotted time elapses. Ensure all responses are finalized and submitted before this time.
If you attempt to submit before the time is up, a pop-up will display the number of questions not attempted and not visited. Confirm your submission to finalize.
Late submissions will not be accepted under any circumstances.

Declaration: I hereby declare that I will abide by the rules and regulations set forth for this assessment.
I understand that any violation of these rules may result in penalties, including disqualification from the assessment.
I acknowledge that I have read and understood the exam conduct and instructions, and agree to comply with them fully.

Additional Information.Technical Support: If you experience technical difficulties, please contact the support team at info@assessli or +91-8888888888.
Additional Information.Accessibility: If you require special accommodations, please notify the exam coordinator in advance.
Additional Information.Feedback: After submitting the exam, you will be directed to a feedback page where you can provide ratings and comments about your experience.
